author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-785. erlang: Eliminate log spew with framed transport
If we get an error when reading from the underlying transport, propagate
it out instead of dying and generating error logs.

author: kayyagari
msg: o fixed illegal state exception caused by destroy method of cache service by just clearing all caches instead of shutting down
o added cache configuration for DN cache

author: dreiss
msg: Build behaviour modules first and include the ebin directory in
the Erlang code path during the rest of the build.

author: dreiss
msg: erlang: Parse multiple options properly in disk_log_transport
